name: Spectrobes: Beyond the Portals
summary: Spectrobes: Beyond the Portals (スペクトロブスシリーズ 超化石モンスターバトル ゲキトツ・ギャラクシー Supekutorobusu Shiriizu Chōkaseki Monsutaa Batoru Gekitotsu Gyarakushii, Spectrobes Series: Super-Fossil Monster Battle - Crash Galaxy) is an Action RPG video game developed by Jupiter and published by Disney Interactive Studios. Spectrobes: Beyond The Portals is the sequel to the best-selling video game, Spectrobes. The sequel was released on October 7, 2008 in North America, November 27, 2008 in Australia, December 11, 2008 in Japan and February 27, 2009 in Europe. A sequel called Spectrobes: Origins was released on the Wii in 2009.
